DOC.brief_summary: In study , investigator evaluate efficacy Bladder Thermal Distention ( BTD ) patient overactive bladder syndrome fail previous treatment anticholinergic drug . The investigator ' hypothesis improve storage symptom .
DOC.brief_title: Bladder Thermal Distention Patients With Refractory Overactive Bladder
DOC.detailed_description: Inclusion criterion : 1 . Patients overactive bladder syndrome 2 . Detrusor Overactivity proven urodynamic test Exclusion criterion : 1 . Mixed urinary incontinence 2 . Active urinary tract infection 3 . Urethral Stricture Outcome measure : 1 . Bladder Diaries 2 . Urgency questionnaire
DOC.criteria: Patients overactive bladder syndrome Detrusor Overactivity proven urodynamic test Exclusion criterion : Mixed urinary incontinence Active urinary tract infection Urethral Stricture
